page.title: 09IRVINE SERVICES * POLICE
page.content: The older part of{Irvine Police Station dates from 100 years ago, the newer building from 10 years ago. 25 police officers work from the station, but that doesn't mean you would see 25 police officers if you walked into the station.Most of them just go into the police station to start and finish tours of duty and to find out what is happening,then they go to the area they are working in.You can join the police force when you are{18 years old.Until a few years ago you could be a cadet from the age of 16 but now there are no cadets.When you join the police you go to a place called Tulliallan for four months to train,then you go to your local training centre,ours is in Glasgow.Men have to be 1.73m tall and women have to be 1.68m tall.
